item.title: Rhombus CLI
item.description: About Rhombus CLI Features Getting started Installation Backup & Restore Usage Basic commands Informative Actions Confidential Transactions (Blind) Wallet unlocking With enhanced privacy Standard unlocking Preview of Rhombus CLI About Rhombus CLI Rhombus-cli offers all the essential features, but doesn’t include all the advanced bells and whistles of Rhombus graphical clients.
